original: yadā cāsya gaṇanāparicayāt tac cittaṃ svarasenaiva vāhimārgasamārūḍham āśvāsapraśvāsālambanopanibaddham avyavacchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ,
analyzed: yadā ca asya gaṇanā paricayāt tat cittam sva rasena eva vāhi mārga samārūḍham āśvāsa praśvāsa ālambana upanibaddham avyavacchinnam nirantaram
niruddhe āśvāse nivṛtti grāhakam praśvāsa śūnya avasthā grāhakam

original: nivṛtte punar nivṛttigrāhakam āśvāsaśūnyāvasthāgrāhakam avikaṃpyam avicalam avikṣepākāram,
analyzed: nivṛtte punar nivṛtti grāhakam āśvāsa śūnya avasthā grāhakam a vikaṃpyam a vicalam a vikṣepa ākāram
na anyatra āśvāsa praśvāsa ālambanam cittam upanibadhyate

original: āśvāsapraśvāsā anugantavyāś cābhilakṣayitavyāś ca sāntarāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ sapravṛttinivṛttyavasthāḥ /
analyzed: āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ anugantavyāḥ ca abhilakṣayitavyāḥ ca sa antara āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ sa pravṛtti nivṛtti avasthāḥ

original: sa khalv eṣa gaṇanāparicayo mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: sa khalu eṣa gaṇanā paricayaḥ mṛdu indriyāṇām vyapadiśyate
vyākṣepa sthānam bhavati citta sthitaye citta nirataye

original: anyathā gaṇanām antareṇa teṣāṃ styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanaheta,
analyzed: anyathā gaṇanām antareṇa teṣām styānam iddham vā cittam paryavanaheta

original: gaṇanāprayuktānāṃ tu teṣām etan na bhavati /
analyzed: gaṇanā prayuktānām tu teṣām etat na bhavati

original: ye tu tīkṣṇendriyāḥ paṭubuddhayas teṣāṃ punar gaṇanāprayogeṇa priyārohatā bhavati /
analyzed: ye tu tīkṣṇa indriyāḥ paṭu buddhayaḥ teṣām punar gaṇanā prayogeṇa priya ārohatā bhavati

original: tatropadiṣṭā evaṃ gaṇanāprayogaṃ laghu laghv eva pratividhyanti,
analyzed: tatra upadiṣṭāḥ evam gaṇanā prayogam laghu laghu eva pratividhyanti

original: te punar āśvāsapraśvāsālambanāṃ smṛtim upanibadhya yatra ca pravartante yāvac ca pravartante,
analyzed: te punar āśvāsa praśvāsa ālambanām smṛtim upanibadhya yatra ca pravartante yāvat ca pravartante

original: tat sarvam anugacchaty upalakṣayaty upasthitayā smṛtyā /
analyzed: tat sarvam anugacchati upalakṣayati upasthitayā smṛtyā

original: tasya ca prayogasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt kāyaprasrabdhir utpadyate,
analyzed: tasya ca prayogasya āsevana anvayāt bhāvanā anvayāt bahulīkāra anvayāt kāya prasrabdhiḥ utpadyate

original: ekāgratāṃ ca spṛśaty ālambanābhiratiṃ ca nirgacchati //
analyzed: ekāgra tām ca spṛśati ālambana abhiratim ca nirgacchati

original: sa evaṃ kṛtaparicayo grāhyagrāhakavastumanasikāreṇa skandhān avatarati /
analyzed: saḥ evam kṛta paricayaḥ grāhya grāhaka vastu manasikāreṇa skandhān avatarati

original: ye cāśvāsapraśvāsā yaś caiṣām āśrayakāyas taṃ manasikurvan rūpaskandham avatarati /
analyzed: ye ca āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ yaḥ ca eṣām āśraya kāyaḥ tam manasikurvan rūpa skandham avatarati

original: yā teṣām āśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ tadgrāhikayā smṛtyā saṃprayuktānubhāvanā sa vedanāskandha ity avatarati /
analyzed: yā teṣām āśvāsa praśvāsānām tad grāhikayā smṛtyā saṃprayuktā anubhāvanā sa vedanā skandhaḥ iti avatarati

original: yā saṃjānanā sa saṃjñāskandha ity avatarati /
analyzed: yā saṃjānanā sa saṃjñā skandhaḥ iti avatarati

original: yā cāsau smṛtir yā ca cetanā,
analyzed: yā ca asau smṛtiḥ yā ca cetanā

original: yac (Śbh II 92) cittaṃ mano vijñānam ayaṃ vijñanaskandha ity avatarati /
analyzed: yat śbh ii cittam manaḥ vijñānam ayam vijñana skandhaḥ iti avatarati

original: yā tadbahulavihāritā evaṃ skandheṣv avatīrṇasyāyam ucyate skandhāvatāraparicayaḥ //
analyzed: yā tad bahula vihāri tā evam skandheṣu avatīrṇasya ayam ucyate skandha avatāra paricayaḥ

original: yadā cānena skandhamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati parijñātaṃ saṃskāramātraṃ vastumātraṃ tadā sa eṣām eva saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādam avatarati /
analyzed: yadā ca anena skandha mātram dṛṣṭam bhavati parijñātam saṃskāra mātram vastu mātram tadā saḥ eṣām eva saṃskārāṇām pratītyasamutpādam avatarati
iti ime āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ kimāśritāḥ kiṃpratyayāḥ

original: “kāyāśritā eta āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyapratyayāś cittāśritāś cittapratyayāś ca” /
analyzed: kāya āśritāḥ ete āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ kāya pratyayāḥ citta āśritāḥ citta pratyayāḥ ca
kāyaḥ punar cittam ca kiṃpratyayam ca

original: sa “kāyaś cittaṃ ca jīvitendriyapratyayam” ity avatarati /
analyzed: sa kāyaḥ cittam ca jīvita indriya pratyayam iti avatarati
sa pūrva saṃskāra pratyayam jīvita indriyam iti avatarati
sa pūrvakaḥ saṃskāraḥ vidyā pratyayaḥ iti avatarati
iti hi avidyā pratyayaḥ pūrvakaḥ saṃskāraḥ
jīvita indriya pratyayaḥ kāyaḥ cittam ca
kāya citta nirodhāt āśvāsa praśvāsa nirodhaḥ

original: sa tadbahulavihārī pratītyasamutpādāvatāre kṛtaparicaya ity ucyate /
analyzed: sa tad bahula vihārī pratītyasamutpāda avatāre kṛta paricayaḥ iti ucyate

original: sa evaṃ pratītyasamutpāde kṛtaparicayo “ya ete saṃskārāḥ pratītyasamutpannā anityā eta” ity avatarati /
analyzed: saḥ evam pratītyasamutpāde kṛta paricayaḥ ye ete saṃskārāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ anityāḥ ete iti avatarati
anitya tvāt a bhūtvā ca bhavanti bhūtvā prativigacchanti

original: punar ete 'bhūtvā bhavanti bhūtvā ca prativigacchanti te jātidharmāṇaḥ,
analyzed: punar ete bhūtvā bhavanti bhūtvā ca prativigacchanti te jāti dharmāṇaḥ
ye jāti jarā vyādhi maraṇa dharmāṇaḥ te duḥkhāḥ
evam saḥ nitya duḥkha śūnya anātma ākāraiḥ duḥkha satyam avatīrṇaḥ bhavati

original: “yā kācid eṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir duḥkhabhūtā rogabhūtā gaṇḍabhūtā sarvāsau tṛṣṇāpratyayā /
analyzed: yā kācid eṣām saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttiḥ duḥkha bhūtā roga bhūtā gaṇḍa bhūtā sarvā asau tṛṣṇā pratyayā

original: yat punar asyā duḥkhajanikāyās tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇam etac chāntam etat praṇītam evaṃ ca me jānata evaṃ bahulavihāriṇas tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ  #
analyzed: yat punar asyāḥ duḥkha janikāyāḥ tṛṣṇāyāḥ aśeṣa prahāṇam etat śāntam etat praṇītam evam ca me jānataḥ evam bahula vihāriṇaḥ tṛṣṇāyāḥ aśeṣa prahāṇam

original: evaṃ hi samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyam avatīrṇo bhavati /
analyzed: evam hi samudaya satyam nirodha satyam mārga satyam avatīrṇaḥ bhavati
sa tad bahula vihārī yadā satyāni abhisamāgacchati
ayam asya ucyate satya avatāra paricayaḥ

original: tasyaivam satyeṣu kṛtaparicayasya darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanāprahātavyā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti //
analyzed: tasya evam satyeṣu kṛta paricayasya darśana prahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanā prahātavyāḥ avaśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti
yeṣām prahāṇāya ṣoḍaśa ākāra paricayam karoti

original: (Śbh II 96) tadyathā smṛta āśvasan “smṛta āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: śbh ii tat yathā smṛtaḥ āśvasan smṛtaḥ āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasan “sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: dīrgham hrasvam sarva kāya pratisaṃvedi āśvasan sarva kāya pratisaṃvedi āśvasimi iti śikṣate
sarva kāya pratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarva kāya pratisaṃvedī praśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasan “prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān āśvasan prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān āśvasimi iti śikṣate
prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān praśvasan prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān praśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: citta saṃskāra pratisaṃvedī prasrabhya citta saṃskārān āśvasan prasrabhya citta saṃskārān āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān praśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: prasrabhya citta saṃskārān praśvasan prasrabhya citta saṃskārān praśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: abhipramodayaṃś cittaṃ samādadhaṃś crttaṃ vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: abhipramodayan cittam samādadhan crttam vimocayan cittam āśvasan vimocayan cittam āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: vimocayaṃś cittaṃ praśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittaṃ praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: vimocayan cittam praśvasan vimocayan cittam praśvasimi iti śikṣate
nirodha anudarśī āśvasan nirodha anudarśī āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: nirodhānudarśī praśvasan nirodhānudarśī praśvasimīti (Śbh II 98) śikṣate //
analyzed: nirodha anudarśī praśvasan nirodha anudarśī praśvasimi iti śbh ii śikṣate

original: sa śaikṣo dṛṣṭapado lābhī bhavati caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām /
analyzed: sa śaikṣaḥ dṛṣṭapadaḥ lābhī bhavati caturṇām smṛti upasthānānām

original: āśvāsapraśvāsālambanaṃ ca manaskāram ārabhate 'vaśiṣṭānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya /
analyzed: āśvāsa praśvāsa ālambanam ca manaskāram ārabhate vaśiṣṭānām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāya
tena āha smṛtaḥ āśvasan smṛtaḥ āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: yadāśvāsaṃ vā praśvāsaṃ vālambate tadā “dīrgham āśvasimi praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: yadā āśvāsam vā praśvāsam vā ālambate tadā dīrgham āśvasimi praśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: yadāntarāśvāsam antarapraśvāsaṃ vālambanīkaroti tadā “hrasvam āśvasimi praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: yadā antara āśvāsam antara praśvāsam vā ālambanīkaroti tadā hrasvam āśvasimi praśvasimi iti śikṣate
tathā hi āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ dīrghāḥ pravartante
antara āśvāsāḥ antara praśvāsāḥ ca hrasvāḥ
te yathā eva pravartante tathā eva upalakṣayati jānāti
yadā sūkṣma sauṣirya gatān āśvāsa praśvāsān romakūpa anupraviṣṭān kāye dhimucyate
ālambanīkaroti tadā sarva kāya pratisaṃvedī bhavati

original: yasmin vā punaḥ samaye niruddha āśvāse 'ntarāśvāse ca /
analyzed: yasmin vā punar samaye niruddhe āśvāse ntarāśvāse ca
āśvāsa praśvāsa śūnyām āśvāsa praśvāsa apetām avasthām ālambanīkaroti

original: praśvāsāśvāsaśūnyāṃ tadvyapetāṃ tadvyavahitāṃ riktām avasthām ālambanīkaroti /
analyzed: praśvāsa āśvāsa śūnyām tad vyapetām tad vyavahitām riktām avasthām ālambanīkaroti
tasmin samaye prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān āśvasan
prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān āśvasimi iti śikṣate
prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān praśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: api tu khalu tasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt /
analyzed: api tu khalu tasya āsevanā anvayāt bhāvanā anvayāt bahulīkāra anvayāt

original: ye kharā duḥsaṃsparśā āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ pūrvam akṛtaparicayasya pravṛtta bhavanti /
analyzed: ye kharāḥ duḥsaṃsparśāḥ āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ pūrvam a kṛta paricayasya bhavanti

original: kṛtaparicayasya anye ca mṛdavaḥ sukhasaṃsparśāḥ pravartante /
analyzed: kṛta paricayasya anye ca mṛdavaḥ sukha saṃsparśāḥ pravartante
tena āha prasrabhya kāya saṃskārān āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: sa caivam ānāpānasmṛtiprayogeṇa ca yuktaḥ sacel lābhī bhavati prathamasya vā dhyānasya dvitīyasya vā tasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasan,
analyzed: sa ca evam āna apāna smṛti prayogeṇa ca yuktaḥ saced lābhī bhavati prathamasya vā dhyānasya dvitīyasya vā tasmin samaye prīti pratisaṃvedī āśvasan

original: sacet punar lābhī bhavati niṣprītikasya tṛtīyasya dhyānasya sa tasmin samaye sukhapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
analyzed: saced punar lābhī bhavati niṣprītikasya tṛtīyasya dhyānasya sa tasmin samaye sukha pratisaṃvedī bhavati

original: tṛtīyāc ca dhyānād ūrdhvam ānāpānasmṛtisaṃprayogo nāsti /
analyzed: tṛtīyāt ca dhyānāt ūrdhvam āna apāna smṛti saṃprayogaḥ na asti
yena yāvat tṛtīya dhyānāt parikīrtitam saṃgṛhītam

original: tasyaivaṃ prītipratisaṃvedino vā sukhapratisaṃvedino vā sacet kadācit karhacit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyate /
analyzed: tasya evam prīti pratisaṃvedinaḥ vā sukha pratisaṃvedinaḥ vā saced kadācid karhacit smṛti saṃpramoṣāt utpadyate
asmi iti vai ayam aham asmi iti vā
na eva saṃjñī na asaṃjñī bhaviṣyāmi iti

original: evam saṃmohasaṃjñācetanāsahagatam iñjitaṃ manyitaprapañcitābhisaṃskṛtaṃ tṛṣṇāgatam utpadyate /
analyzed: evam saṃmoha saṃjñā cetanā sahagatam iñjitam manyita prapañcita abhisaṃskṛtam tṛṣṇā gatam utpadyate

original: sa tad utpannaṃ laghu laghv eva prajñayā pratividhyati nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
analyzed: sa tat utpannam laghu laghu eva prajñayā pratividhyati na adhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti

original: evaṃ cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ty āśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: evam citta saṃskāra pratisaṃvedī prasrabhya citta saṃskārān āśvasimi iti āśvasan prasrabhya citta saṃskārān āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: sacet punar lābhī bhavati maulānāṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyānāṃ dhyānānāṃ sa cāvaśyam anāgamyasya prathamadhyānasāmantakasya lābhī bhavati /
analyzed: saced punar lābhī bhavati maulānām prathama dvitīya tṛtīyānām dhyānānām sa ca avaśyam anāgamyasya prathama dhyāna sāmantakasya lābhī bhavati

original: sa taṃ niśrityotpannaṃ svaṃ cittaṃ pratyavekṣate /
analyzed: sa tam niśritya utpannam svam cittam pratyavekṣate

original: sarāgaṃ vā vigatarāgaṃ vā sadveṣaṃ vā vigatadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ,
analyzed: sa rāgam vā vigata rāgam vā sa dveṣam vā vigata dveṣam vā sa moham vigata moham

original: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhataṃ vyupaśāntaṃ avyupaśāntaṃ
analyzed: saṃkṣiptam vikṣiptam līnam pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhatam vyupaśāntam a vyupaśāntam

original: samāhitam asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti
analyzed: samāhitam a samāhitam su bhāvitam a su bhāvitam vimuktam cittam a vimuktam cittam iti

original: sa yadā styānamiddhanivaraṇena cittaṃ nivṛtaṃ bhavaty adhyātmam saṃśamayatas tadānyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanena saṃdarśayati samādāpayati  #
analyzed: sa yadā styānam iddha nivaraṇena cittam nivṛtam bhavati adhyātmam saṃśamayataḥ tadā anyatama anyatamena prasadanīyena ālambanena saṃdarśayati samādāpayati

original: yadā punar auddhatyanivaraṇena kaukṛtyanivaraṇena nivṛtaṃ paśyaty abhisaṃpragṛhṇatas
analyzed: yadā punar auddhatya nivaraṇena kaukṛtya nivaraṇena nivṛtam paśyati abhisaṃpragṛhṇataḥ
tadā anyatama anyatamena prasadanīyena ālambanena saṃdarśayati adhyātmam avasthāpayati

original: yadā ca tac cittam āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayān nivaraṇasamudācārād dūrīkṛtaṃ bhavati nivaraṇebhyo viśodhitam /
analyzed: yadā ca tat cittam āsevana anvayāt bhāvanā anvayāt bahulīkāra anvayāt nivaraṇa samudācārāt dūrīkṛtam bhavati nivaraṇebhyaḥ viśodhitam

original: tenāha vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
analyzed: tena āha vimocayan cittam āśvasan vimocayan cittam āśvasimi iti śikṣate

original: tasya nivaraṇebhyo vimuktacetaso mārgabhāvanāyā āntarāyikebhyo 'nuśayā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti prahātavyāḥ /
analyzed: tasya nivaraṇebhyaḥ vimukta cetasaḥ mārga bhāvanāyāḥ āntarāyikebhyaḥ nuśayāḥ avaśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti prahātavyāḥ

original: yaduta saṃskārānityatām eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca yoniśaḥ pratyaveksate /
analyzed: yat uta saṃskāra anitya tām eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca yoniśas

original: tena ca pūrvaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasanniśrayeṇānāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa vā punaḥ śamathayogaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tena ca pūrvam prathama dvitīya tṛtīya dhyāna sanniśrayeṇa anāgamya saṃniśrayeṇa vā punar śamatha yogaḥ kṛtaḥ
etarhi anitya anudarśī vipaśyanāyām yogam karoti

analyzed: tathā hi sa labdheṣu ārya kānteṣu śīleṣu
na ca adharmeṇa cīvara ādīni paryeṣate

original: iti tāny āryakāntāni śīlāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yā vāk pravartate yac ca kāyakarma yaś cājīvaḥ,
analyzed: iti tāni ārya kāntāni śīlāni adhipatim kṛtvā mārga bhāvanā kāle yā vāc pravartate yat ca kāya karma yaḥ ca ājīvaḥ
te pi samyak vāc karmānta ājīvāḥ iti ucyante

original: tasya samyagdṛṣṭisamyaksaṃkalpavākkarmāntājīvasanniśrayeṇa bhāvanāprayuktasya yac chando vīryo vyāyāmo niṣkramaḥ parākramasthāmārambhaś cetasaḥ  #
analyzed: tasya samyak dṛṣṭi samyak saṃkalpa vāc karmānta ājīva sat niśrayeṇa bhāvanā prayuktasya yat chandaḥ vīryaḥ vyāyāmaḥ niṣkramaḥ parākrama sthāma ārambhaḥ cetasaḥ  /

original: yac catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvāviparyāsasaṃgṛhītā smṛtir navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā /
analyzed: yat catvāri smṛti upasthānāni adhipatim kṛtvā a viparyāsa saṃgṛhītā smṛtiḥ nava ākārā nava ākāra citta sthiti saṃgrāhikā
iyam ucyate samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ ca

original: tad etat sarvam abhisamasyāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś cārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ /
analyzed: tat etat sarvam abhisamasya ārya aṣṭa aṅgaḥ mārgaḥ cāra karaṇīye ca vihāra karaṇīye ca avasthitaḥ
tatra samyak vāc karmānta ājīvāḥ cāra karaṇīye
yaḥ ca samyak vyāyāmaḥ iyam vipaśyanā

original: tatra yā ca samyaksmṛtir yaś ca samyaksamādhir ayaṃ śamathaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yā ca samyak smṛtiḥ yaḥ ca samyak samādhiḥ ayam śamathaḥ

original: evaṃ pariśuddhān vākkarmāntājīvān niśritya śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati kālena kālaṃ niravaśeṣasaṃyojanaprahāṇaṃ sākṣātkaroty agraphalam arhattvaṃ  #
analyzed: evam pariśuddhān vāc karmānta ājīvān niśritya śamatha vipaśyanām bhāvayati kālena kālam niravaśeṣa saṃyojana prahāṇam sākṣātkaroti agra phalam arhat tvam

original: prākarṣikaś ca bhāvanāmārgaḥ kālāntarābhyāsena kleśān prajahāti /
analyzed: prākarṣikaḥ ca bhāvanā mārgaḥ kāla antara abhyāsena kleśān prajahāti

original: jñānamātrapratibaddhas tu darśanamārgo jñānotpattimātrakeṇa kleśān prajahāti /
analyzed: jñāna mātra pratibaddhaḥ tu darśana mārgaḥ jñāna utpatti mātrakeṇa kleśān prajahāti
anena kāraṇena vāc karmānta ājīvāḥ bhāvanā mārge vyavasthāpitāḥ

original: iti ya evam eṣām anayānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām abhyāsaḥ paricayaḥ /
analyzed: iti yaḥ evam eṣām anayā ānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatām bodhi pakṣyāṇām dharmāṇām abhyāsaḥ paricayaḥ
srotaāpatti phalam sakṛdāgāmi phalam anāgāmi phalam agra phalam arhat tvam

original: api ca pūrvotpannasya mārgasya paścād utpanno mārgaḥ phalaṃ madhyo viśiṣṭo vā sadṛśo vā /
analyzed: api ca pūrva utpannasya mārgasya paścāt utpannaḥ mārgaḥ phalam madhyaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ vā sadṛśaḥ vā

original: punas tatra kena kāraṇena catvāri vyavasthāpitāni /
analyzed: punar tatra kena kāraṇena catvāri vyavasthāpitāni

original: tadyathā nirvastukānāṃ kleśānām apāyagamanīyānām apāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇāt pratipakṣotpādāc ca srota-āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
analyzed: tat yathā nirvastukānām kleśānām apāya gamanīyānām apāya gamana hetu bhūtānām prahāṇāt pratipakṣa utpādāt ca srotaāpatti phalam vyavasthāpitam

original: trayāṇāṃ tu saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād vyavasthāpitaṃ bhagavatā triṣu pakṣeṣu,
analyzed: trayāṇām tu saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt vyavasthāpitam bhagavatā triṣu pakṣeṣu
durākhyāta dharma vinaya pakṣe su ākhyāta dharma vinaya pakṣe ca
trayāṇām saṃyojanānām mārga utpattaye vibandha kara tvāt
tatra gṛhi pakṣe sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ

original: yayāyam ādita eva na prayujyata ity ādita uttrāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: yayā ayam āditas eva na prayujyate iti āditas uttrāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ
durākhyāte dharma vinaye śīla vrata parāmarśaḥ
uccalitaḥ pi mithyā pratipādayati yena ārya mārgaḥ na utpadyate

original: na ca mithyāpratipanno 'pi tv anabhyāsāt tasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhavati jñeye vastuni tāvat kāṅkṣā vimatayo vibandhakarā bhavanti  #
analyzed: na ca tu anabhyāsāt tasya yāvat yathā bhūta darśanam na bhavati jñeye vastuni tāvat kāṅkṣāḥ vimatayaḥ vibandha karāḥ bhavanti
anena tāvat kāraṇena srotaāpatti phala vyavasthānam

original: tasyāsya srota-āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
analyzed: tasya asya srotaāpannasya param sapta bhavāḥ avaśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti

original: sa cāsya janmaprabandho yadā ca janmaprābandhikān kleśān prajahāti devabhavasaṃgṛhītān manuṣyabhavasaṃgṛhītāṃś ca,
analyzed: sa ca asya janma prabandhaḥ yadā ca janma prābandhikān kleśān prajahāti deva bhava saṃgṛhītān manuṣya bhava saṃgṛhītān ca

original: yeṣāṃ prahāṇāt param ekaṃ devabhavam abhinirvartayaty ekaṃ manuṣyabhavam /
analyzed: yeṣām prahāṇāt param ekam deva bhavam abhinirvartayati ekam manuṣya bhavam

original: yadā tu devabhavam eva kevalam abhinirvartayati,
analyzed: yadā tu deva bhavam eva kevalam abhinirvartayati
sarva bhava upapatti saṃvartanīya kleśa prahāṇāt agra phalam arhat tva phalam vyavasthāpyate

original: tat punaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇām saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvād bhagavatā vyavasthāpitam,
analyzed: tat punar sakṛdāgāmi phalam trayāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt rāga dveṣa mohānām ca tanu tvāt bhagavatā vyavasthāpitam
pañcānām avara bhāgīyānām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt anāgāmi phalam
paryādāya sarva kleśa prahāṇāt arhat tva phalam

original: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohamānavitarkacariteṣu pudgaleṣu pūrvaṃ tāvac (Śbh II 242)
analyzed: tatra ye rāga dveṣa moha māna vitarka cariteṣu pudgaleṣu pūrvam tāvat

original: caritaviśodhana ālambane caritaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ tataḥ paścāc cittasthitim adhigacchanti /
analyzed: carita viśodhane ālambane caritam viśodhayitavyam tatas paścāt citta sthitim adhigacchanti

original: teṣāṃ pratiniyatam eva tad ālambanam avaśyaṃ tais tenālambanena prayoktavyam /
analyzed: teṣām pratiniyatam eva tat ālambanam avaśyam taiḥ tena ālambanena prayoktavyam

original: samabhāgacaritasya tu yatra priyārohitā tatra tena prayoktavyaṃ kevalaṃ cittasthitaye,
analyzed: sama bhāga caritasya tu yatra priyā ārohitā tatra tena prayoktavyam kevalam citta sthitaye
yathā sama bhāga caritaḥ evam manda rajaskaḥ veditavyaḥ
rāga ādi caritaḥ prayujyamānaḥ cireṇa adhigantā bhavati
sama bhāga caritaḥ na ati cireṇa

original: mandarajaskas tv āśu tvaritatvaritaṃ cittasthitim adhigacchati //
analyzed: manda rajaskaḥ tu āśu tvarita tvaritam citta sthitim adhigacchati
tatra uktāni pūrvam rāga ādi caritānām pudgalānām liṅgāni

original: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṅgāni /
analyzed: sama bhāga caritasya pudgalasya manda rajaskasya ca katamāni liṅgāni

original: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṅgāni saṃvidyante yāni rāgādicaritānām,
analyzed: sama bhāga caritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṅgāni saṃvidyante yāni rāga ādi caritānām

original: tāni rāgādīni tu nādhimātrāṇi na pradhānāni yathā rāgādicaritānām /
analyzed: tāni rāga ādīni tu na adhimātrāṇi na pradhānāni yathā rāga ādi caritānām
anāvṛtaḥ bhavati ādi śuddha saṃbhāra saṃbhṛtaḥ

original: prasādabahulo medhāvī puṇyavān guṇānvitaś ca bhavati //
analyzed: prasāda bahulaḥ medhāvī puṇyavān guṇa anvitaḥ ca bhavati

original: tatra trīṇy āvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇam /
analyzed: tatra trīṇi āvaraṇāni karma āvaraṇam kleśa āvaraṇam vipāka āvaraṇam
tatra karma āvaraṇam pañca ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi

original: yac cānyad api kiṃcit karma saṃcetanīyaṃ gurukarma vipakvavipākaṃ mārgotpattaye nibandhakārakam /
analyzed: yat ca anyat api kiṃcid karma saṃcetanīyam guru karma vipakva vipākam mārga utpattaye nibandha kārakam
tatra kleśa āvaraṇam tīvra kleśa tā āyata kleśa tā ca

original: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayitum /
analyzed: yā dṛṣṭe dharme carita viśodhanena ālambana viśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayitum
tatra vipāka āvaraṇam yatra ārya mārgasya apravṛttiḥ apracāre upapatti āyatane
tatra upapannaḥ jaḍaḥ bhavati eḍamūkaḥ hastasaṃvācikaḥ

original: apratibalo bhavati subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātum //
analyzed: apratibalaḥ bhavati subhāṣita durbhāṣitānām dharmāṇām artham ājñātum

original: tatrādiśuddhiḥ śīlaṃ ca suviśuddhaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca ṛjvī /
analyzed: tatra ādi śuddhiḥ śīlam ca su viśuddham dṛṣṭiḥ ca ṛjvī

original: tatra śīlaṃ suviśuddhaṃ daśabhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyam /
analyzed: tatra śīlam su viśuddham daśabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ veditavyam
su cintita dharma arthasya niḥkāṅkṣa niḥ vicikitsā prayoga niryāṇa tayā
vigata māyā śāṭhyā ca yā dṛṣṭiḥ
ṛjuka jātīyaḥ yathā anuśiṣṭaḥ ca pratipadyate

original: dharmāṇāṃ vānityatām ārabhya duḥkhatāṃ śūnyatām anātmatām arthaḥ suvicintito bhavati sutulitaḥ sūpaparīkṣitaḥ,
analyzed: dharmāṇām vā anitya tām ārabhya duḥkha tām śūnya tām anātma tām arthaḥ su vicintitaḥ bhavati su tulitaḥ su upaparīkṣitaḥ
yad hetoḥ ayam niḥkāṅkṣaḥ bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ

original: itīyaṃ caturākārā dṛṣṭir yathoddiṣṭā dṛṣṭyṛjutety ucyate //
analyzed: iti iyam catur ākārā dṛṣṭiḥ yathā uddiṣṭā dṛṣṭi ṛju tā iti ucyate
puṇya saṃbhāraḥ jñāna saṃbhāraḥ pūrvakaḥ dṛṣṭa dhārmikaḥ ca

original: tatra puṇyasaṃbhāro yenāpy etarhy ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ pracurā bhavanti pradakṣiṇāḥ,
analyzed: tatra puṇya saṃbhāraḥ yena api etarhi ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ pracurāḥ bhavanti pradakṣiṇāḥ
tatra jñāna saṃbhāraḥ yena medhāvī bhavati

original: tatra pūrvako yenaitarhi paripakvānīndriyāṇi labhate pūrvakuśalamūlopacayāt /
analyzed: tatra pūrvakaḥ yena etarhi paripakvāni indriyāṇi labhate pūrva kuśala mūla upacayāt
tatra dṛṣṭa dhārmikaḥ tat yathā kuśalaḥ dharma chandaḥ

original: tathā paripakvendriyasya śīlasaṃvara indriyasaṃvara iti vistareṇa pūrvavat //
analyzed: tathā paripakva indriyasya śīla saṃvaraḥ indriya saṃvaraḥ iti vistareṇa pūrvavat

original: na śāstari kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati prasīdaty adhimucyate,
analyzed: na śāstari kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati prasīdati adhimucyate
tatra medhā yayā āśu dharmam udgṛhṇāti

original: cireṇa dharmam arthaṃ ca na vismārayati,
analyzed: cireṇa dharmam artham ca na vismārayati

original: tatra kṛtapuṇyatā yayābhirūpo bhavati darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko dīrghāyur bhavati,
analyzed: tatra kṛta puṇya tā yayā abhirūpaḥ bhavati darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ dīrgha āyuḥ bhavati

original: ādeyavākyo maheśākhyo jñāto bhavati mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarādīnām,
analyzed: ādeya vākyaḥ maheśākhyaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati mahā puṇyaḥ lābhī cīvara ādīnām

original: tatra guṇānvita iti guṇā alpecchatādayo veditavyāḥ,
analyzed: tatra guṇa anvitaḥ iti guṇāḥ alpa icchā tā ādayaḥ veditavyāḥ
taiḥ ayam prakṛtyā eva samanvāgataḥ bhavati

original: itīmāny evaṃbhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni //
analyzed: iti imāni evaṃbhāgīyāni manda rajaskasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni

original: tadyathā śramaṇo brāhmaṇo brahmacārī bhikṣur yatiḥ pravrajitaś ceti //
analyzed: tat yathā śramaṇaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ brahmacārī bhikṣuḥ yatiḥ pravrajitaḥ ca iti
tatra yaḥ sugataḥ sa mārga jinaḥ
yaḥ dharma vādī sa mārga deśikaḥ
yaḥ su pratipannaḥ sa mārga jīvī
yaḥ mithyā pratipannaḥ sa mārga dūṣī
sugataḥ ca ucyate śeṣam rāga dveṣa moha kṣayam anuprāptaḥ
dharma vādī yaḥ rāga dveṣa moha vinayāya dharmam deśayati
su pratipannaḥ yaḥ rāga dveṣa moha vinayāya pratipannaḥ

original: api ca śaikṣāśaikṣā mārgajinā ity ucyante,
analyzed: api ca śaikṣa aśaikṣāḥ mārga jināḥ iti ucyante

original: tatra tathāgato bodhisattvāś cāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ /
analyzed: tatra tathāgataḥ bodhisattvāḥ ca āyatyām bodhāya pratipannāḥ

original: śrāvakāś ca sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharāś ca,
analyzed: śrāvakāḥ ca sūtra dharāḥ vinaya dharāḥ mātṛkā dharāḥ ca

original: tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā lajjināḥ kaukṛtikāḥ śikṣākāmāḥ /
analyzed: tatra ye pṛthagjana kalyāṇakāḥ ātma hitāya pratipannāḥ lajjināḥ kaukṛtikāḥ śikṣā kāmāḥ

original: bhavyāś ca pratibalā yāvad asākṣātkṛtasya (Śbh II 252)
analyzed: bhavyāḥ ca pratibalāḥ yāvat a sākṣātkṛtasya

original: apy eṣām ūṣmā yenema āryasya prajñendriyasyotpattaye na mṛtā jīvantīty ucyante /
analyzed: api eṣām ūṣmā yena ime āryasya prajñā indriyasya utpattaye na mṛtāḥ jīvanti iti ucyante

original: tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvad abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijñaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ yam pudgalaḥ duḥśīlaḥ pāpa dharmā yāvat abrahmacārī brahmacāri pratijñaḥ

yena ayam abhavyaḥ bhavati a pratibalaḥ

original: yatrāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate tatra prathamaśramaṇas tatra yāvac caturtha iti //
analyzed: yatra ārya aṣṭa aṅgaḥ mārgaḥ prajñāyate tatra prathama śramaṇaḥ tatra yāvat caturthaḥ iti
yaḥ yam brāhmaṇa kule jātaḥ yoni jaḥ mātṛ saṃbhūtaḥ

original: tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptir vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra saṃjñā brāhmaṇaḥ iti loke nāma bhavati saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptiḥ vyavahāraḥ

original: vāhitā bhavanty anena pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ /
analyzed: vāhitāḥ bhavanti anena pāpakāḥ akuśalāḥ dharmāḥ

original: yathoktaṃ na kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti kṛtārtho brāhmaṇaḥ smṛta iti //
analyzed: yathā uktam na kāryam brāhmaṇasya asti kṛtārthaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ iti
tat yathā virati samādāyī tad antara prahāyī tad atyanta prahāyī ca

original: yo brahmacaryād maithunadharmāt prativirato bhavati samādattaśikṣaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ brahmacaryāt maithuna dharmāt prativirataḥ bhavati samādatta śikṣaḥ
yaḥ laukikena mārgeṇa kāma vīta rāgaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ
yaḥ kuśalāt kāya vāc karmaṇaḥ prativirataḥ
ārakṣita smṛtiḥ nipaka smṛtiḥ vistareṇa pūrvavat
yasya darśana bhāvanā prahātavyāḥ kleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ
utpanna utpannam ca chanda vitarkam vyāpāda vihiṃsā vitarkam

original: abhidhyāvyāpādamithyādṛṣṭikrodhopanāhamrakṣapradāśādīny āpāyikāni sthānāni nairayikāṇi durgatigāmīny aśramaṇakārakāṇy utpannotpannāni,
analyzed: abhidhyā vyāpāda mithyādṛṣṭi krodha upanāha mrakṣa pradāśa ādīni āpāyikāni sthānāni nairayikāṇi durgati gāmīni a śramaṇa kārakāṇi utpanna utpannāni
saḥ yam dvividhaḥ kleśa saṃyamaḥ bhavati
su ākhyāta dharma vinayaḥ durākhyāta dharma vinayaḥ ca

original: api ca pravrājayaty ātmanaḥ pāpakān akuśalān dharmān,
analyzed: api ca pravrājayati ātmanaḥ pāpakān akuśalān dharmān

original: tadyathā tīrthikaparivrājo nirgrantho vā parivrājakaḥ pāṇḍuraka iti,
analyzed: tat yathā tīrthika parivrājaḥ nirgranthaḥ vā parivrājakaḥ pāṇḍurakaḥ iti

original: tenāha śramaṇo brāhmaṇo brahmacārī bhikṣur yatiḥ pravrajita iti pudgalaparyāyāḥ //
analyzed: tena āha śramaṇaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ brahmacārī bhikṣuḥ yatiḥ pravrajitaḥ iti pudgala paryāyāḥ
kṛta paricayaḥ kṛta paricayaḥ ca iti

lābha satkāra anabhigṛddheḥ kudṛṣṭi anabhiniveśasya ca śraddhā deya a vinipātanena saddharma a pratikṣepaṇena
ca āyatyām api kāma adhyavasāna kudṛṣṭi utpāda hetu parivarjanataḥ viśuddhi viśeṣam darśayati

original: (35) pareṣāṃ skhalite doṣe anābhogaḥ sukhī bhavet /
analyzed: pareṣām skhalite doṣe anābhogaḥ sukhī bhavet

original: ātmanaḥ skhalitaṃ doṣaṃ jñātvā vivṛṇuyāt punaḥ // iti //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ skhalitam doṣam jñātvā vivṛṇuyāt punar iti
pareṣām ca doṣa darśana ābhoga vivarjanena
sva kuśala pakṣa avikṣepa saumanasya utpattyā
ātma doṣa parijñāna āviṣkaraṇena ca nirabhimāna tayā śikṣā viśuddhim darśayati
āpattim ca tathā āpannaḥ yathādharmam prakalpayet
tathā iti karaṇīyeṣu svayaṃkārī paṭuḥ bhavet iti
āpatti vyutthānataḥ parebhyaḥ ca upasthāna paricaryā svīkaraṇa kāma tā parivarjanataḥ viśuddhim darśayati

original: (37) buddhānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca anubhāvaṃ ca deśanām /
analyzed: buddhānām śrāvakāṇām ca anubhāvam ca deśanām
śrāddhaḥ vadya darśī ca na abhyācakṣīta sarvathā iti
śraddhā saṃpattyā abhyākhyāne ca avadya darśi tayā viśuddhiḥ paridīpitā
su gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu a tarka avacareṣu ca

original: paurāṇam āgamaṃ tyaktvā svadṛṣṭiṃ na parāmṛśet // iti //
analyzed: paurāṇam āgamam tyaktvā sva dṛṣṭim na parāmṛśet iti
svayaṃdṛṣṭi parāmarṣa sthāyi tva parivarjanataḥ pi viśuddhi viśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ
vyavakṛṣṭa vihārī syāt prānte hi śayana āsane
kuśalān bhāvayet dharmān dṛḍha vīrya parākramaḥ iti
kāya cittasya vyavakṛṣṭa tayā samādhi anukūla śayana āsana āsevana tayā akuśala vitarka varjita ekānta śukla dharma bhāvanayā
laya auddhatya ādi upakleśān abhibhavanīya tvena ca su saṃnaddha prayoga tayā ādhi cittam śikṣaṇa upāya viśeṣam darśayati
a chandikaḥ chanda jātaḥ a praduṣṭaḥ vidūṣaṇaḥ

original: nirmiddhaś caiva middhīva kāle śānto na ca sthitaḥ //
analyzed: nirmiddhaḥ ca eva middhī iva kāle śāntaḥ na ca sthitaḥ
niṣkaukṛtyaḥ sa kaukṛtyaḥ niḥkāṅkṣaḥ ca kāṅkṣati

original: sarvathā sarvadā yukto bhavet saṃyakprayogavān // iti //
analyzed: sarvathā sarvadā yuktaḥ bhavet saṃyak prayogavān iti
ābhyām gāthābhyām arh kāma chanda vyāpāda styānam iddha auddhatyaka vicikitsā nivaraṇa parivarjanāt kuśala dharma chandika tayā kāma vidūṣaṇena
kuśala pakṣa prayoga kalya tā nimittam ca kāle middha niṣevaṇena

original: cittaṃ śamayataś ca līyamāne citte tadāśaṅkini vā prasadanīyanimittamanasikārāc chamānavasthitatvena,
analyzed: cittam śamayataḥ ca līyamāne citte tad āśaṅkini vā prasadanīya nimitta manasikārāt śama anavasthita tvena

original: cāragatasya ca prāg āpattes tadanadhyācārataḥ sakaukṛtyatayā,
analyzed: cāra gatasya ca prāk āpatteḥ tad anadhyācārataḥ sa kaukṛtya tayā

original: uttarottaraviśeṣākāṅkṣaṇatayā ca satkṛtyasātatyena ca saṃyakprayuktasya cādhicittaṃśikṣāviśuddhiṃ darśayati //
analyzed: uttara uttara viśeṣa ākāṅkṣaṇa tayā ca satkṛtya sātatyena ca saṃyak prayuktasya ca adhi cittam śikṣā viśuddhim darśayati
nudanaḥ bodhanaḥ ca eva tathā paraḥ

original: (43) niṣpīḍanaś ca paramaḥ snehanaḥ kalpa ucyate /
analyzed: niṣpīḍanaḥ ca paramaḥ snehanaḥ kalpaḥ ucyate

original: kāmarāgasya janakas taṃ budhaḥ parivarjayet // iti //
analyzed: kāma rāgasya janakaḥ tam budhaḥ parivarjayet iti

original: atrāṣṭavidhasya vikalpasya maithunarāgajanakasyādāv ārabhya krameṇotpadyamānasya yāvan niṣṭhāgamanataḥ parivarjanayā śikṣāviśuddhiviśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ
analyzed: atra aṣṭavidhasya vikalpasya maithuna rāga janakasya ādau ārabhya krameṇa utpadyamānasya yāvat niṣṭhā gamanataḥ parivarjanayā śikṣā viśuddhi viśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ

original: tatra nudano vikalpo yo rañjanīye vastuny ayoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktaś cittasya prerakaḥ /
analyzed: tatra nudanaḥ vikalpaḥ yaḥ rañjanīye vastuni cittasya prerakaḥ

original: bodhano yas tasminn eva vastuni prabuddharāgaparyavasthānasaṃprayuktaḥ /
analyzed: bodhanaḥ yaḥ tasmin eva vastuni prabuddha rāga paryavasthāna saṃprayuktaḥ
naimittikaḥ tasmin eva vastuni vicitra śubha nimitta grahakaḥ
snehanaḥ prāpte tasmin vastuni adhyavasāna saṃprayuktaḥ

original: vilasano yas tasminn eva vastuni vicitraparibhogābhilāṣanānāmukhapravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: vilasanaḥ yaḥ tasmin eva vastuni vicitra paribhoga abhilāṣa nānā mukha pravṛttaḥ
niṣpīḍanaḥ yaḥ dvaya dvaya indriya samāpatti kāle
atṛpti karakāḥ kāmāḥ bahu sādhāraṇāḥ tathā
adharma hetavaḥ ca eva tathā tṛṣṇā vivardhakāḥ
satām vivarjanīyāḥ ca kṣipram vilaya gāminaḥ

original: pratyayeṣv āśritāḥ kāmāḥ pramādasya ca bhūmayaḥ // iti //
analyzed: pratyayeṣu āśritāḥ kāmāḥ pramādasya ca bhūmayaḥ iti

original: aṣṭābhir ākārair dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca yathāyogaṃ kāmānām ādīnavadarśanena kāmacchandaprahāṇopāyaṃ darśayati //
analyzed: aṣṭābhiḥ ākāraiḥ dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca yathāyogam kāmānām ādīnava darśanena kāma chanda prahāṇa upāyam darśayati
karaṅka sadṛśāḥ kāmāḥ māṃsa peśī upamāḥ tathā
tṛṇa ulkā sadṛśāḥ ca eva tathā agni śikhā upamāḥ
āśīviṣa upamāḥ ca eva tathā svapna upamāḥ punar
yācñā alaṃkāra sadṛśāḥ tathā vṛkṣa phala upamāḥ

original: (48a) evaṃ kāmān parijñāya nābhigṛdhyet kathaṃcana // iti //
analyzed: evam kāmān parijñāya na abhigṛdhyet kathaṃcana iti

original: atra pūrvoktānām aṣṭānām atṛptikaratvādināṃ kāmeṣv ādīnavānām sarvalokasiddhair upamopanyāsair ādīnavatvaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: atra pūrvoktānām aṣṭānām atṛpti kara tva ādinām kāmeṣu ādīnavānām sarva loka siddhaiḥ upamā upanyāsaiḥ ādīnava tvam darśayati

original: ye nāmaivaṃ bahuṣv āviṣkṛtādīnavāḥ kathaṃ nāma teṣu paṇḍito gṛdhyed iti saṃdarśanārtham /
analyzed: ye nāma evam bahuṣu āviṣkṛta ādīnavāḥ katham nāma teṣu paṇḍitaḥ gṛdhyet iti saṃdarśana artham
tatra atṛpti karakāḥ karaṅka sadṛṣa tvāt
bahu sādhāraṇā māṃsa peśī upama tvāt
adharma hetavaḥ tṛṇa ulkā sādṛśyena a tyakta ādahana pratyupasthāna tayā
tṛṣṇā vivardhanāḥ agni khada upama tayā tṛṣṇā saṃjanana sādharmyeṇa
kṣipram vilaya gāminaḥ svapna upama tayā
pratyaya āśritā yācñā alaṃkāra sadṛśa tayā
pramāda bhūmayaḥ vṛkṣa agra phala upama tayā

original: (48b) saddharmaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ cintayed bhāvayed api /
analyzed: saddharmam śṛṇuyāt nityam cintayet bhāvayet api

original: vijahya kleśadauṣṭhulyaṃ prahāṇe ca rato bhavet //
analyzed: vijahya kleśa dauṣṭhulyam prahāṇe ca rataḥ bhavet

original: kuryāc ca kāmavairāgyaṃ rūpavairāgyam eva ca //
analyzed: kuryāt ca kāma vairāgyam rūpa vairāgyam eva ca

original: dṛṣṭe dharme ca nirvāyāt tathā upadhi saṃkṣayāt // iti //
analyzed: dṛṣṭe dharme ca nirvāyāt tathā upadhi saṃkṣayāt iti

original: atra lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedyādibhiḥ saptabhir manaskārair laukikalokottaramārgaviśuddhyā sopadhinirupadhinirvāṇaphalādhiprajñaṃśikṣāviśuddhiḥ paridīpitā
analyzed: atra lakṣaṇa pratisaṃvedi ādibhiḥ saptabhiḥ manaskāraiḥ laukika lokottara mārga viśuddhyā sa upadhi nirupadhi nirvāṇa phala adhi prajñam śikṣā viśuddhiḥ paridīpitā
tatra lakṣaṇa pratisaṃvedī saddharma śravaṇa cintana vacanena paridīpitaḥ
śānta audārika darśī prāk iti prāvivekyaḥ
mīmāṃsakaḥ syāt nimitte iti mīmāṃsā manaskāraḥ
prayoga paramaḥ bhavet iti prayoga niṣṭhaḥ

original: kuryāc ca kāmavairāgyaṃ rūpavairāgyam eva ca /
analyzed: kuryāt ca kāma vairāgyam rūpa vairāgyam eva ca

original: satyābhisamayaṃ kuryāt sarvavairāgyam eva ceti laukikalokottaraprayoganiṣṭhāphalaṃ ca //
analyzed: satya abhisamayam kuryāt sarva vairāgyam eva ca iti laukika lokottara prayoga niṣṭhā phalam ca
